name: person_desc_three_line_schema_v1
description: Three-line person description for ReID: LINE 1 identity schema (fixed tokens), LINE 2 three noun-phrase cues, LINE 3 non-identity context for filtering/reranking only.
prompt:
You describe ONE pedestrian for person re-identification. Describe ONLY the person. Use lowercase ascii.

OUTPUT: EXACTLY THREE LINES. No extra text.

LINE 1 — identity schema (16 pairs; fixed order; "; " separators; no spaces around "="):
gender=male|female|unknown; top_color=black|white|gray|red|orange|yellow|green|blue|purple|brown|pink|unknown; top_type=tee|shirt|blouse|hoodie|sweater|jacket|coat|dress|none|unknown; sleeve=long|short|sleeveless|unknown; bottom_color=black|white|gray|red|orange|yellow|green|blue|purple|brown|pink|unknown; bottom_type=jeans|trousers|shorts|skirt|dress|none|unknown; bottom_length=long|knee|short|unknown; shoes_color=black|white|gray|red|orange|yellow|green|blue|purple|brown|pink|unknown; shoes_type=sneakers|boots|loafers|heels|sandals|unknown; bag_color=black|white|gray|red|orange|yellow|green|blue|purple|brown|pink|none|unknown; bag_type=backpack|shoulder|hand|waist|none|unknown; headwear=cap|hood|hat|none|unknown; hair=short|long|ponytail|bald|covered|unknown; accessories=glasses|mask|scarf|watch|none; pattern=solid|stripes|plaid|logo|text|other|none; distinctive=<≤5 words clothing/accessory cue only>

LINE 2 — EXACTLY three cues, noun phrases only, joined by " | ":
<cue1> | <cue2> | <cue3>

LINE 3 — context (non-identity; use ONLY these tokens; "; " separators; fixed order):
camera_angle=front|back|left|right|front-left|front-right|overhead|low|unknown;
visibility=full|upper|lower|partial|heavy|unknown;
light_dir=front|back|left|right|top|diffuse|unknown;
age_group=child|teen|young-adult|adult|middle-aged|elder|unknown

HARD RULES:
- Use ONLY the listed tokens. If unsure, write unknown. Never write alternations or slashes.
- If bottom_type=dress → top_type=none and set bottom_length.
- If bag_type=none → bag_color=none; else bag_color must be a palette color.
- DISTINCTIVE and LINE 2 cues must be clothing/pattern/logo/accessory only. No actions, background, camera, or lighting terms.
- Use "tee" (not t-shirt/tshirt). Map slippers→sandals.
- Stop after LINE 3.

Usage: embed LINE 1 and LINE 2 only. Use LINE 3 for rules-based filters or re-ranking.
